select b.user_account customerAccount, b.name customerName, b.sex customerSex, b.phone customerPhone, b.email email, b.idcard idCard, a.user_id userId from t_sys_customer a,t_sys_user b where a.is_deleted = 0 and a.user_id = b.user_id
and b.name like concat('%',#{customerName},'%')
and b.user_account like concat('%',#{customerAccount},'%')
order by a.gmt_create desc
select role from t_sys_user where user_id = #{userId}

select b.user_account customerAccount, b.name customerName, b.sex customerSex, b.phone customerPhone, b.email email, b.idcard idCard, a.user_id userId from t_sys_customer a,t_sys_user b where a.is_deleted = 0 and a.user_id = b.user_id and a.store_id = (select c.store_id from t_sys_store c where c.user_id = #{userId})
and b.name like concat('%',#{customerName},'%')
and b.user_account like concat('%',#{customerAccount},'%')
order by a.gmt_create desc
